node.title: How To Study the Bible and Know God's Will For Your Life
node.description: This is no doubt two of the most important things to learn. Like all skills there is need of training, patience and perseverance in the study of the Word of God. Come and hear many practical tips for your study to be extremely interesting, life-giving and spiritually invigorating. Learn the key principles to find out God’s great plan for your life, to live the best life you could ever live.
